channel.title: 5 different questions.. please answer at least 1 of them
channel.description: 1. how do i get a npc to attack another npc? 2. how do i make a new person spawn somewhere other than varrock mine? 3. how do i change the amount of health a npc has? 4. how do i make a server public? (make it so that i can advertise it and people can join) 5. how do i make a quest?

item.title: 5 different questions.. please answer at least 1 of them
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“dinetime, post:2, topic:22005”]answer to 3: go to npc.cfg and you see the name-combat-health change health

answer to 4:download hamachi from…
www.hamachi.com[/quote]
http://www.hamachi.cc
not www.hamachi.com :-p[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 08:23:13 PM[/size][hr][quote=“cool4345, post:1, topic:22005”]1. how do i get a npc to attack another npc?
2. how do i make a new person spawn somewhere other than varrock mine?
3. how do i change the amount of health a npc has?
4. how do i make a server public? (make it so that i can advertise it and people can join)
5. how do i make a quest?[/quote]
answer to 2: Well you need a server source… get one from look through here… http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html
